item.title: R Package for Econometrics
item.description: Reconometrics is a new R package for econometrics, currently under development. It utilizes routines from existing trustworthy packages and provides some additional functions in order to organize a reliable end-to-end econometric analysis. It allows the user to specify some methodological guidelines and organize a large scale analysis. It focuses both on: Undergraduate students who want a practical tool to apply and practice what they have learned and at the same time to understand how things work instead of just clicking and observing the results.
